package step4;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.Date;

public class Task {
	
	public String getDate(String releaseDate,int day){
		/********* Begin *********/
		String outday="";
		Calendar c = Calendar.getInstance();
		
		DateFormat format1 = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
		Date date = null;
		
		try {
			date = format1.parse(releaseDate);
		} catch (ParseException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} 
		c.setTime(date);
		c.add(Calendar.DATE, day);
		outday=c.get(Calendar.YEAR)+"-";
		int n=c.get(Calendar.MONTH)+1;
		if(n<10) outday=outday+"0"+n;
		else outday=outday+n;
		
		n=c.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
		if(n<10) outday=outday+"-0"+c.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
		else outday=outday+"-"+c.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
		return outday;










        /********* End *********/
	}
	
	
}
